_comment: Copy to FAILURE_MEMORY.json and update. This example documents the BUG-1 to BUG-5 entries.

entries.title: Source Health click opens wrong drilldown (shows category window, not that source)
entries.symptom: Clicking any Source Health card opens the SAME drilldown content (classification window), not filtered by that specific source.
entries.root_cause: sourceIdToName mapping fails: coverage has source_id but items use source_name. Wrong value passed to ItemsDrilldown.
entries.fix: Add source_name to coverage; pass source_name to onSourceClick.
